existing_features.title: Remove the 'Brotherhood of Copper' banner image from the Home Page hero section by deleting the banner block that references `/assets/generated/brotherhood of copper banner.png` in `frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx`, ensuring the hero layout still has balanced spacing above the icon/title on mobile and desktop.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove the 'Brotherhood of Copper' banner from the site/app

projectName: Remove 'Brotherhood of Copper' banner from Home Page hero
